result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ga: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.orig: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.html: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ponchtml: Ná blais aon deor den ḃeoir ṁallaiṫe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol

result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
